title: Protection & Indemnity (P&I) club certificates
dataVerified: Shipowner, vessel IMO, P&I club, tonnage limit, pollution coverage
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake P&I certificates. Domain binding verifies International Group P&I club. Extremely high limits ($1bn+ pollution/collision liability). Port state control verification. Oil Pollution Act (OPA 90) compliance. Long claims tail.
